channel.title: 508 tutorials?
channel.description:
Hullos thar :P
I'm looking for 508 tuts but I can't seem to find any but how to set up HD or whatnot.
I just really want to know how to make prayer work and how to make godwars work better, editing monster drops especially when you do not have a npcdrops.cfg -.- and so on.
So just generally I would like to see any 508 tuts because I simply can't find any! Even google doesn't know.
Thank you Iceman

item.title: 508 tutorials?
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

I can tell you how to setup both?, like it connects to HD and LD, I’ll give you the code if you want to use it :).

Go to login.java and search for:

junk

then where it says:

loginEncryptPacketSize--; int junk29 = p.stream.readUnsignedByte(); int encryption = junk29; if(!(encryption == 10 || encryption == 64)) { encryption = p.stream.readUnsignedByte(); }

Replace it with:

loginEncryptPacketSize--; int junk29 = p.stream.readUnsignedByte(); int encryption = junk29; if(!(encryption == 10 || encryption == 64)) { encryption = p.stream.readUnsignedByte(); } if (encryption != 10 && encryption != 64) { p.loginStage = -1; return; }.
I did not make this, so don’t rep me.

Read full topic
